storage
Class BDBWrapper

java.lang.Object
  storage.BDBWrapper

public class BDBWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper class encapsulating initiation, connection to and manipulation of a BDB instance

Version:
20130409
Author:
Michael Collis (mcollis@seas.upenn.edu)

Method Detail

setupDB

public boolean setupDB(java.lang.String pathToDB)
Sets up the DB instance and initializes the empty list of entity stores

Parameters:
pathToDB - Absolute path to the DB folder (throws an exception if the folder does not exist)
Returns:
True if DB setup succeeds; false otherwise

getEnvironment

public com.sleepycat.je.Environment getEnvironment()
Retrieves the DB Environment

Returns:
Environment in which the database is operating

closeDB

public boolean closeDB()
Shuts down the DB instance and closes all open EntityStores

Returns:
True if all the EntityStores were closed correctly and the Environment was closed without error; false otherwise

setupStore

public boolean setupStore(java.lang.String name)
Opens the EntityStore with the input name. If no such EntityStore exists, it will be created

Parameters:
name - Name of EntityStore to open
Returns:
True if EntityStore is already open, if one with the input name was found and opened successfully, or if a new EntityStore with that name was created successfully; false otherwise

getEntityStore

public com.sleepycat.persist.EntityStore getEntityStore(java.lang.String name)
Retrieves the EntityStore with the input name

Parameters:
name - Name of EntityStore to retrieve
Returns:
If it exists, the EntityStore with the input name is retrieved; else, returns null

getPrimaryIndex

public <T,K> com.sleepycat.persist.PrimaryIndex<T,K> getPrimaryIndex(java.lang.String name,
                                                                     java.lang.Class<T> pKey,
                                                                     java.lang.Class<K> value)
Retrieves the PrimaryIndex for a given EntityStore

Parameters:
name - Name of the EntityStore for which to retrieve the PrimaryIndex
pKey - Class of the PKey of the PrimaryIndex being retrieved
value - Class of the value of the PrimaryIndex being retrieved
Returns:
If an EntityStore of the input name exists, has matching PKey and value Class templates, and is open, its PrimaryIndex is returned; else, returns null
